Description: The following statement contains a magic number: if (lockAcquired)              {                  Console.WriteLine("Lock Acquired");                  Console.WriteLine("Spawning other lock-contending process...");                  var p = StartProcess();                  Console.WriteLine("Sleeping until lock times out (and not releasing it)...");                  Thread.Sleep(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(20));                  Console.WriteLine("Waking up...");                  Console.WriteLine("Press any key to exit");                  Console.ReadKey();              }              else              {                  Console.WriteLine("Failed to acquire lock.");              }
